p: Now, we could obtain the probability of death in terms of time for COVID9 in two different countries (See Fig. 2, Fig. 3, Fig. 4). It is clear that with time, the pandemic rate grows, turns over some peaks, and then decreases. However, decreasing the pandemic rate in one country or region, the virus will be injected into other country, and a new growth in the pandemic rate in other part of the world could be observed. The maximum growth rate in the world seems to be a constant; however, this maximum is exchanged between different countries.
